title: You Never Know
lyrics: Aesseoseo hwaljjak useotdeon nare bameun wae deo eoduulkka It keeps bringing me down, down, down Modu neomu swipge naebaetdeon mal ama deulligetji meojiana I've heard enough, I've heard e nough On sesangi bakkwieogado ajik naneun geudaeron geol naega georeoganeun i gireul kkumkku deon Geuttae geudae ro geuttae geudae ro nae maeireul chumchu deon cheoeum geu jarie nama inneun geol But you'll never know unless you walk in my shoes You'll never know eongkyeobeorin nae kkeun 'Cause everybody sees what they wanna see It's easier to judge me than to be lieve gipi sumgyeotdeon nalgeun saenggakdeul Gakkeum nareul japgo goeropijiman Geureolsurok I'ma shine, baby Sunday night I've been swallowed by my bed I've been all over my head Wonderin' if I gotta trying pre tend Nuga arajugil gidaehaneun nae moseubeul chajeulkka duryeowo Jeo bichi deo balgajilsurok Nae geurimjado gireojineun de Neomu nuni busyeool ttae On sesangi bakkwieogado ajik naneun geudaeron geol naega georeoganeun i gireul kkumkku deon Geuttae geudae ro geuttae geudae ro nae maeireul chumchu deon cheoeum geu jarie nama inneun geol But you'll never know unless you walk in my shoes You'll never know eongkyeobeorin nae kkeun 'Cause everybody sees what they wanna see It's easier to judge me than to be lieve gipi sumgyeotdeon nalgeun saenggakdeul Gakkeum nareul japgo goeropijiman Geureolsurok I'ma shine, baby Garaanjeumyeon an dwae nado jal a ra ttangman boneun chaeron nal su eop seo gureum geonneopyeonen naega geuryeo watdeon geurim soge Jjijeobeorin gotdeulkkaji Da biwo naego u seul su itge bogi sileotdeon nawa majuhal lae eh nan gieo kae So I'll be okay Paran nae bang hangadeuk kkochi pi ge I'll always be waiting But you'll never know unless you walk in my shoes You'll never know eongkyeobeorin nae kkeun 'Cause everybody sees what they wanna see It's easier to judge me than to be lieve gipi sumgyeotdeon nalgeun saenggakdeul Gakkeum nareul japgo goeropijiman Geureolsurok I'ma shine, baby
